p: In this regard, the research and development of new alternative therapies for Chagas Disease remain pressing concerns. New pharmacological approaches should be more efficient and selective, seeking complete parasite elimination, but with adequate modulation of the host immune response and limitation of cellular damage [ 11]. To this end, in the last two decades, intensive research has been focused on the study of the properties of whole extracts or compounds isolated from plants or synthesized based on natural prototypes, which have shown promising results against parasite infections [ 12, 13].
